plot: A cunning little three-year-old chap sitting between two girls and making love to them impartially. One of the little girls is exceedingly shy, and her actions are extremely ludicrous. An unusually fine subject.
title: An Impartial Lover
plot_es: A cunning little three-year-old chap sitting between two girls and making love to them impartially. One of the little girls is exceedingly shy, and her actions are extremely ludicrous. An unusually fine subject.
plot_en: A cunning little three-year-old chap sitting between two girls and making love to them impartially. One of the little girls is exceedingly shy, and her actions are extremely ludicrous. An unusually fine subject.
